page.title: 13CHILDREN'S LEISURE
page.content: THERE IS A CUB SCOUTS GROUP FOR BOYS FROM THE AGE OF 7-11. CUB SCOUTS DO VARIOUS ACTIVITIES SUCH AS CAMPING. THERE IS A BROWNIES GROUP FOR GIRLS FROM THE AGE OF 7-11. WHEN YOU LEAVE BROWNIES YOU MAY SOMETIMES WANT TO GO TO GUIDES WHICH IS FOR GIRLS FROM THE AGE OF 11-15. GUIDES OFTEN GO CAMPING BECAUSE THERE IS A WEEK CAMP AND A WEEKEND CAMP. BILLINGHAY HAS A LOCAL PLAYING FIELD WHERE THERE IS A SLIDE, SOME SWINGS, A SEE-SAW AND A ROCKING HORSE. A SLIDE IS AN OBSTACLE WHICH HAS STEPS. YOU CLIMB UP THE STEPS AND SLIDE DOWN A SHEET OF WOOD OR METAL TO GET TO THE BOTTOM. BILLINGHAY ALSO HAS AN OUTDOOR SWIMMING POOL WHICH OPENS FOR ABOUT FOUR MONTHS IN THE SUMMER.
